DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of lip closure in the oral impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Oral Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Lip Closure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's lip closure during swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Oral Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Lip Closure
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's lip closure during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing.
An observation of an individual's lip closure during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of escape beyond mid-chin during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of escape beyond mid-chin during swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of escape progressing to mid-chin during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of escape progressing to mid-chin during swallowing.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Escape from interlabial space or lateral juncture; no extension beyond vermilion border

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Escape from interlabial space or lateral juncture; no extension beyond vermilion border
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: A finding of escape beyond the vermilion border during swallowing.: A finding of escape from interlabial space or lateral juncture during swallowing, but no extension.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
A finding of escape beyond the vermilion border during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Escape From Interlabial Space or Lateral Juncture; No Extension
Concepts.definition: A finding of escape from interlabial space or lateral juncture during swallowing, but no extension.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Interlabial Escape; No Progression to Anterior Lip

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Interlabial Escape; No Progression to Anterior Lip
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of interlabial escape during swallowing, but no progression to anterior lip.

Concepts.longName: Interlabial Escape; No Progression to Anterior Lip
Concepts.definition: A finding of interlabial escape during swallowing, but no progression to anterior lip.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of no labial escape during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: A finding of no labial escape during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
